meanings.definition: The quality or state of being bounded.
meanings.sent1: The boundednesses of the garden made it easy to keep track of the property lines.
meanings.sent2: The boundednesses of the national park ensured the safety of the wildlife.
meanings.sent3: The boundednesses of the maze confused the adventurous mouse.
meanings.sent4: The boundednesses of the ocean seemed to stretch endlessly into the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The boundednesses of the fence provided a sense of security for the children playing in the yard.

meanings.definition: The condition of having limits or boundaries.
meanings.sent1: The boundednesses of the project helped the team stay focused on their goals.
meanings.sent2: The boundednesses of the city were clearly defined by the river that ran through it.
meanings.sent3: The boundednesses of the cookie jar tempted the mischievous toddler.
meanings.sent4: The boundednesses of the law were tested by the clever lawyer.
meanings.sent5: The boundednesses of the forest created a sense of adventure for the hikers exploring its trails.
